Translation of 楚竹書・君人者(en) into English.

p.seg: Fan Wu said:
“The Lord has three round white jades
without blemishes,
I will ask the lord to break them,
may you tell his majesty [視日=皇上]?
The king came out and received him in audience.
The king said:
“Fang Cheng, how is it that I have three round white jades
without blemishes?
Fang Cheng said:
“In the middle of the Chu state there are those who eat from the fields [=officials] and own only 5 zhen,
with pipes and lutes always in front of them.
The lord has (the whole) Chu
but does not listen to the sound of drums and bells,
this is the first deviation [from common practice].
A lord with a precious jade,
the master of one hundred zhen,
has tens and hundreds of concubines.
His majesty has Chu,
and only three consorts,
of which one has shut her doors and will not come out,
this is the second deviation.
As for the joy of the musicians ???
nobody under Heaven is opposed to it,
that’s why the former kings would observe it in person.
His majesty has made the rites (too) stern
and does not make music for them,
this is the third deviation.
The former kings would behave like this
and people would call this pacifying the state,
this is called profiting the people.
Now his majesty has completely rejected the desire of the ears and eyes,
and the people believe his majesty to be distant and haughty.
As the people have limit in what they can do,
but the spirits do not,
if the people curse (the king) and cause (the spirits) to give him (=the king) retribution,
that the king will not reach old age.
is quite possible.
